snippet: After months of withholding his endorsement, the mayor threw his support behind Mrs. Clinton in an interview on MSNBC’s “Morning Joe.”
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio officially endorses presidential candidacy of Hillary Rodham Clinton during appearance on MSNBC television program Morning Joe; announcement comes months after de Blasio initially denied Clinton his endorsement and is given comparatively little notice by Clinton campaign, reflecting reduced interest in his endorsement.
lead_paragraph: After months of withholding his endorsement, the mayor threw his support behind Mrs. Clinton in an interview on MSNBC’s “Morning Joe.”

headline.print_headline: De Blasio Endorses Clinton Presidency, to Little Fanfare From Campaign
headline.main: Bill de Blasio Endorses Hillary Clinton, to Little Fanfare From Campaign
